duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and install koi ponds and waterfalls according to client specifications and design preferences.
Travel to various locations to complete construction and landscaping projects, ensuring high-quality workmanship.
Perform service calls and maintenance on existing koi ponds and water features.
Operate a vehicle to transport tools, materials, and supplies to job sites.
Provide excellent customer service and maintain professional relationships with clients during and after project completion.
